programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: New Perceptions
programme.desc: Services presented by Dr. Dwight K. Nelson from the Andrews University Campus.

programme.title: Revelation of Hope Seminar - Taj Pacleb
programme.desc: Pastor Taj Pacleb delivers a sermon and encourages people to follow the right path and live in accordance with God's will.

programme.title: Home at Last
programme.desc: Pastor Mike Tucker takes an honest look at God. It's for people who have questions about the truth of the Bible.

programme.title: CreationScapes
programme.desc: Scenes with different themes and moods; soothing and inspirational music.

programme.title: Hope Sabbath School
programme.desc: A group of young adults participate in an in-depth and interactive study of the BIble while discussing a variety of topics.

programme.title: Wake Up With Hope
programme.desc: Hosts Christian and Heidi Martin deliver messages from the Bible that guide people through their daily lives.

programme.title: It Is Written: Canada
programme.desc: Straightforward, Christ-centered presentations that inspire and encourage.

programme.title: Spencerville Church
programme.desc: A variety of religious speakers share different Christian doctrines and passages from the Bible alongside their reflections on them.

programme.title: Maranatha Mission Stories
programme.desc: Testimonies by people from various walks of life who have transformed their lives with help from Maranatha Mission volunteers.

programme.title: Wake Up With Hope
programme.desc: Hosts Christian and Heidi Martin deliver messages from the Bible that guide people through their daily lives.

programme.title: Cliff!
programme.desc: Author and speaker Cliff Goldstein melds basic truths, literature, and popular culture to answer some of life's most abstract questions. A former atheist, he understands firsthand the struggle with faith.

programme.title: It Is Written: Canada
programme.desc: Straightforward, Christ-centered presentations that inspire and encourage.

programme.title: Reimagining God
programme.desc: Watch as international speaker and author Ty Gibson paints an astonishingly desirable picture of God that you may find irresistible.

programme.title: Go Healthy for Good!
programme.desc: Discovery of HIV: Join us as we interview Dr. Robert Gallo, who co-discovered that HIV was the cause of AIDS, developed the HIV blood test and who currently directs ongoing HIV research.

programme.title: Hope Sabbath School
programme.desc: A group of young adults participate in an in-depth and interactive study of the BIble while discussing a variety of topics.

programme.title: Bible Heroes Game Show
programme.desc: Hosts Nathan DeWild and Garrison Hayes test out the biblical knowledge of the young contestants through a series of quizzes and activities.

programme.title: The Torchlighters
programme.desc: This series of animated programs with strong values and educational content presents the stories of true-life heroes from Christian history. Kids will see what God can do through a Torchlighter and be challenged to carry their own torch.

programme.title: Into the Bible

programme.title: The First Texan
programme.desc: Having left his post as governor of Tennessee, Gen. Sam Houston (Joel McCrea) resettles in Mexican territory along the southwest U.S. border. He soon sets his sights on reclaiming the land under the aegis of Texas independence, while romancing post-divorce new love interest Katherine Delaney (Felicia Farr). His efforts eventually lead to the historic Battle of San Jacinto and a very clever bit of battlefield strategy by Houston in his fight against forces led by Gen. Santa Anna.

programme.title: Rough Shoot
programme.desc: After retired U.S. officer Robert Taine (Joel McCrea) believes he has accidentally shot and killed a poacher, he comes upon two strangers, Hiart (Marius Goring) and his driver, Diss, and is unaware that they are spies who have actually murdered the man. Polish operative Sandorski (Herbert Lom), a British intelligence aide, recruits Bob and his wife, Cecily (Evelyn Keyes), to prevent Hiart, Diss and their British contact, Magda, from reaching a scientist vital to foreign enemy interests.

programme.title: The Son of Davy Crockett
programme.desc: President Ulysses S. Grant enlists a frontiersman's son to help insure the inclusion of Texas into the Union.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick was an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible. His simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: A judge's daughter pines for Earp, who shares her feelings but doubts a relationship can endure his life as a lawman; two local outfits cause trouble for Earp after he arrests their leaders, culminating in a fight between Earp and their foreman.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Holmes and Watson try to trace an undetectable murder weapon.

programme.title: The Victim
programme.desc: A rich woman (Elizabeth Montgomery) goes to her sister's house during a storm and is trapped inside with a killer.

programme.title: Change of Habit
programme.desc: Dr. John Carpenter (Elvis Presley) takes the job of running a health center in a low-income district. He enlists three women to help out who -- unbeknownst to him -- are actually nuns in street clothes. The church wants to improve the neighborhood but fears that nuns in full habit would not be well received. Unaware of her unavailability, John falls for Sister Michelle (Mary Tyler Moore), serenading her with his guitar -- which, luckily for him, effectively wears away at her religious resolve.

programme.title: Sands of Iwo Jima
programme.desc: Marine Sgt. John Stryker (John Wayne) is despised by his own men for his rough attitude and exhausting training regimen. As the war in the Pacific progresses, though, they begin to respect Stryker's hard-edged outlook on war and his brutal training methods, as it has helped them prepare for the harsh realities of the battlefield. They'll need all of Stryker's battle tactics if they want to survive what will end up being one of the bloodiest engagements of the war: the Battle of Iwo Jima.

programme.title: The First Texan
programme.desc: Having left his post as governor of Tennessee, Gen. Sam Houston (Joel McCrea) resettles in Mexican territory along the southwest U.S. border. He soon sets his sights on reclaiming the land under the aegis of Texas independence, while romancing post-divorce new love interest Katherine Delaney (Felicia Farr). His efforts eventually lead to the historic Battle of San Jacinto and a very clever bit of battlefield strategy by Houston in his fight against forces led by Gen. Santa Anna.

programme.title: Comanche Station
programme.desc: When solitary cowboy Jefferson Cody (Randolph Scott) hears tales of a white woman living as a captive of the Comanche tribe, he rides deep into the tribe's territory to exchange goods for her freedom. As Cody escorts the captive woman away, he learns that she is Nancy Lowe (Nancy Gates), and that there is a sizable reward offered by her husband for her return. Cody and Mrs. Lowe must brave ruthless bounty hunters greedy for the reward, as well as the now-warring Comanches, to make it to safety.

programme.title: Thunder Over the Plains
programme.desc: It's the late 1860s, and the U.S. government has yet to reclaim Texas as a state. A group of opportunistic and amoral Northerners head south to claim the territory as their own. Though Texas lawman Capt. Porter (Randolph Scott) believes it's his duty to honor the local leaders, he can't ignore the corruption of the Yankee politicians who are giving him orders. When Confederate veteren Ben (Charles McGraw) is unjustly sentenced to death, Porter decides he has had enough of his new bosses.

programme.title: Halls of Montezuma
programme.desc: Lieutenant Carl Anderson (Richard Widmark) is a former teacher who leads a band of Marines to an island under Japanese control during World War II, intending to capture enemy soldiers and gain information. When a Japanese soldier reveals a cave where his forces are willing to surrender, the Marines arrive there, only to be ambushed and suffer grave casualties. Now Anderson, having lost much of his original team, must summon up enough courage to attack an important rocket base.

programme.title: The Caine Mutiny
programme.desc: During World War II, a dilapidated vessel, the Caine, gets a new ensign, Willis Keith (Robert Francis), and a new captain, Commander Queeg (Humphrey Bogart). The crew sees Queeg's unconventional behavior as irrational, and communications officer Thomas Keefer (Fred MacMurray) spreads suspicion about his suitability as captain. When a dire situation during a storm forces the executive officer (Van Johnson) to relieve Queeg of his duties, he and Ensign Keith are tried for mutiny.

programme.title: The Verdict
programme.desc: Scotland Yard Superintendent George Edward Grodman (Sydney Greenstreet) is fired after an investigation he heads up results in the wrongful death sentence of an innocent man. Grodman's replacement is the arrogant John R. Buckley (George Coulouris), who haughtily delights in his sudden promotion. Wanting to spite Buckley while also finding redemption for his own mistake, Grodman teams up with artist Victor Emmric (Peter Lorre) to solve a mysterious new murder case.

programme.title: Casanova Brown
programme.desc: Casanova Brown (Gary Cooper) is about to marry Madge (Anita Louise) when he learns that his former wife, Isabel (Teresa Wright), has just had a baby that belongs to him, and plans to put the child up for adoption. Casanova runs out on the wedding, disguises himself as a doctor, visits the hospital where his infant daughter is being held and runs off with her to a hotel, where he does his best to care for the baby. Before long, Madge and Isabel hunt down Casanova, whom they are both furious with.

programme.title: Lawless Range
programme.desc: Rodeo man John Middleton (John Wayne) is called upon for a favor by Hank Mason (Wally Howe), a friend of the Middletons who lives in a nearby town. But, when John arrives at Hank's, the man's niece, Ann (Sheila Mannors), informs him that Hank has been abducted. John then teams up with the local sheriff, takes on a disguise and begins investigating cattle rustlers who could be connected to the disappearance. He's led to a corrupt banker (Frank McGlynn Jr.), who has plans to take over the town.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick was an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible. His simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Earp must keep a tight lid on problems in Dodge City while a journalist from New York pays a visit, but the job proves especially difficult on a chaotic day filled with dog fights, gunfire and rowdy cowboys.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: A battered hat and a Christmas goose are Holmes' only clues to clearing a falsely accused man.

programme.title: Jubal
programme.desc: Searching for work, cowboy Jubal Troop (Glenn Ford) arrives in a small town, where he badly injures his hand. Fortunately, a local rancher, Shep Horgan (Ernest Borgnine), is willing to employ Troop despite the injury. Horgan and Troop work together amicably, but Horgan's two-timing wife (Valerie French) threatens to create discord when she becomes interested in Troop, although he really loves another woman. A jealous cowhand (Rod Steiger) complicates matters by spreading lies.

programme.title: Battle Stations
programme.desc: Crewmen (John Lund, William Bendix, Keefe Brasselle) of an Essex class aircraft carrier train for action in the Pacific, then come home.

programme.title: From Here to Eternity
programme.desc: While a Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor looms, an Army sergeant (Burt Lancaster), a former boxer (Montgomery Clift) and an officer's wife (Deborah Kerr) become entangled with others at an Army base on Oahu.

programme.title: In Harm's Way
programme.desc: Two Navy officers (John Wayne, Kirk Douglas) fight guilt and the Japanese in the World War II Pacific.

programme.desc: Three men play dirty tricks to charm a beautiful young woman.

programme.title: Laramie Mountains
programme.desc: The Durango Kid learns that crooked scouts are behind attempts to escalate a war between a local tribe and the cavalry.

programme.title: Through the Bible With Les Feldick
programme.desc: Les Feldick was an Oklahoma farmer and rancher with a special gift for teaching the Bible. His simple and nondenominational approach on the program "Through the Bible with Les Feldick" has reached millions around the world with the Gospel of Grace.

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: When a disgruntled cowhand holes up in a warehouse, Earp investigates the man's experiences in Dodge City to understand what drove him to violence and uncovers a chain of abuse perpetrated by underhanded citizens.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: A young woman is offered a lucrative post as governess to a small boy, provided she complies with several unusual requests made by her new employer.

programme.title: Battle Stations
programme.desc: Crewmen (John Lund, William Bendix, Keefe Brasselle) of an Essex class aircraft carrier train for action in the Pacific, then come home.

programme.title: From Here to Eternity

programme.title: In Harm's Way
programme.desc: Two Navy officers (John Wayne, Kirk Douglas) fight guilt and the Japanese in the World War II Pacific.

programme.title: Jubal
programme.desc: A Wyoming rancher's (Ernest Borgnine) wife eyes a drifter (Glenn Ford), and her ex-lover (Rod Steiger) tells her husband.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo
programme.desc: Apache Natives are after Ellen (Bibi Andersson), her baby, and her husband, William (Dennis Weaver). The family crosses paths with Jess (James Garner), a man who is trying to find out who killed his own wife, a Native American woman. He begins to travel with the couple, but the trailing Apaches soon chase them all into a canyon. Jess is able to escape the situation and alert nearby soldiers. In the process, he also discovers a shocking revelation about his wife's death.

programme.title: Run Silent, Run Deep
programme.desc: After Japanese forces torpedo his submarine during World War II, commanding officer "Rich" Richardson (Clark Gable) is placed in charge of the USS Nerka. The crew on board the Nerka -- led by Lieutenant Jim Bledsoe (Burt Lancaster), who had been passed over for promotion when Richardson was brought in -- is openly hostile to their new commander, especially when it becomes clear that Richardson's sole obsession is finding and destroying the Japanese ship that sank his old vessel.

programme.title: Operation Pacific
programme.desc: In the South Pacific, submarine officer Duke Gifford (John Wayne) and the crew of the "Thunderfish" are attacked by the Japanese during a rescue mission, and their torpedoes malfunction. Returning safely to Pearl Harbor, Duke meets his ex-wife, Mary (Patricia Neal), who still feels strongly for him but is engaged to a pilot, the brother of Duke's commander, Pop Perry (Ward Bond). Determined to win Mary back, Duke is sidetracked when he and the crew are ordered on a mission with new torpedoes.

programme.title: The First Time
programme.desc: A young married couple, Joe (Robert Cummings) and Betsey Bennet (Barbara Hale), are parents-to-be, expecting their first child. When the day arrives, the two frantically race to the hospital -- even smashing into a few trash cans along the way. With the delivery a success, Joe and Betsey get to discover what it's truly like being parents, beginning with the hospital bill. As the demands on their patience, wallets and time increase, Joe and Betsey are on the edge and close to falling off.

programme.title: The Idle Class
programme.desc: The Little Tramp (Charles Chaplin) is mistaken for a wealthy golfer.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo

The family crosses paths with Jess (James Garner), a man who is trying to find out who killed his own wife, a Native American woman. The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: Holmes and his brother investigate why an abducted man was forced to interpret for a Greek man swathed in bandages.

When the day arrives, the two frantically race to the hospital -- even smashing into a few trash cans along the way. With the delivery a success, Joe and Betsey get to discover what it's truly like being parents, beginning with the hospital bill. As the demands on their patience, wallets and time increase, Joe and Betsey are on the edge and close to falling off.

programme.title: The Texas Rangers
programme.desc: The Civil War has ended, the Union Army has pulled out, and now the Texas Rangers are needed once again to protect their state from harm. The newly reformed Rangers decide to take a chance by hiring a notorious outlaw Johnny Carver (George Montgomery). They offer the desperado amnesty for his previous crimes if he'll put his famous trigger finger to work for Texas. Carver agrees, but his new job won't be easy, as his old rival, the Sundance Kid (Ian MacDonald), is out for vengeance.

programme.title: Gentle Annie
programme.desc: After robbing a train, two brothers part with an unseen collaborator and go to a saloon, where they meet Lloyd Richland (James Craig), an undercover marshal investigating the crime. The thieves befriend Lloyd and waitress Mary (Donna Reed), taking them to the family home to meet their mother, Annie (Marjorie Main). With help from Mary, Lloyd realizes that his hosts are the robbers, and he learns the identity of the third robber as the brothers shoot it out with a corrupt local lawman.

programme.title: Trouble Along the Way
programme.desc: Once a famous football coach, Steve Williams (John Wayne) is now a bookie in a pool hall. To earn enough money to keep custody of his tomboy daughter, Carole (Sherry Jackson), Steve accepts an offer to take over the football program of impoverished St. Anthony's College in New York City. Disgusted with the team, Steve brings in new players. After his first game nets the school $31,000, an investigation into his shady recruiting methods threatens both his job and custody battle.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: Adaptation of the Pierre Bouelle novel about POWs in Burma forced to build a bridge to aid the war effort of their Japanese captors. British and American officers plot to blow up the structure, but the commander of the bridge's construction has different plans.

programme.title: Thirty Seconds Over Tokyo
programme.desc: During World War II, Lt. Col. James H. Doolittle (Spencer Tracy) leads the U.S. Air Force in a bombing mission over Japan. Doolittle and his men stage a successful attack on Tokyo, but most pilots run out of fuel while returning from the raid. Many are forced to land on Japanese soil, but Capt. Ted Lawson (Van Johnson), who has a pregnant wife at home, crash-lands in the sea off the coast of China. Stranded, Lawson must heroically endure a series of harrowing challenges to make it back home.

programme.title: Tammy and the Bachelor
programme.desc: When pilot Peter Brent (Leslie Nielsen) crashes a small airplane in a swamp near the houseboat of Tambrey "Tammy" Tyree (Debbie Reynolds) in Mississippi, Tammy takes it upon herself to nurse him back to health. While caring for him, she falls in love. To show his gratitude, Brent agrees to take Tammy to his home when her grandfather is arrested for bootlegging. Living in a new town, Tammy struggles to impress Brent's family and friends. And Brent soon realizes he's falling in love with Tammy.

programme.title: The Desert Trail
programme.desc: John Scott (John Wayne) is a rodeo rider, assisted by his buddy Kansas Charlie (Eddy Chandler). But while the duo is settling a debt with their promoter, Farnsworth (Henry Hall), thieves Pete (Al Ferguson) and Jim (Paul Fix) murder and rob Farnsworth and manage to pin the crimes on John and Charlie. The accused then flee, assume two new identities, take up with a shopkeeper named Anne (Mary Kornman) and set out to clear their names and bring the real killers to justice.

programme.title: Trouble Along the Way
programme.desc: Once a famous football coach, Steve Williams (John Wayne) is now a bookie in a pool hall. To earn enough money to keep custody of his tomboy daughter, Carole (Sherry Jackson), Steve accepts an offer to take over the football program of impoverished St. Anthony's College in New York City. Disgusted with the team, Steve brings in new players. After his first game nets the school $31,000, an investigation into his shady recruiting methods threatens both his job and custody battle.

programme.title: EZ WELL Massage System - Relax, Restore, Rejuvenate -Full-Body Relief!
programme.desc: Experience the Remedy Massage System! Feel weightless and remove pressure points with zero gravity memory foam while vibration, infrared heat, and deep tissue massage work to soothe aches, boost circulation, and relax your body. Unwind & recharge!

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: When Dora Hand convinces Jim Kelley to sell his saloon in advance of their marriage, McGuire and Albright wrangle a deal to make Earp part-owner of the saloon without his knowledge and frame him for illegal business practices.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: Adaptation of the Pierre Bouelle novel about POWs in Burma forced to build a bridge to aid the war effort of their Japanese captors. British and American officers plot to blow up the structure, but the commander of the bridge's construction has different plans.

programme.title: Thirty Seconds Over Tokyo
programme.desc: During World War II, Lt. Col. James H. Doolittle (Spencer Tracy) leads the U.S. Air Force in a bombing mission over Japan. Doolittle and his men stage a successful attack on Tokyo, but most pilots run out of fuel while returning from the raid. Many are forced to land on Japanese soil, but Capt. Ted Lawson (Van Johnson), who has a pregnant wife at home, crash-lands in the sea off the coast of China. Stranded, Lawson must heroically endure a series of harrowing challenges to make it back home.

programme.title: Gentle Annie
programme.desc: After robbing a train, two brothers part with an unseen collaborator and go to a saloon, where they meet Lloyd Richland (James Craig), an undercover marshal investigating the crime. The thieves befriend Lloyd and waitress Mary (Donna Reed), taking them to the family home to meet their mother, Annie (Marjorie Main). With help from Mary, Lloyd realizes that his hosts are the robbers, and he learns the identity of the third robber as the brothers shoot it out with a corrupt local lawman.

programme.title: Comanche Station
programme.desc: When solitary cowboy Jefferson Cody (Randolph Scott) hears tales of a white woman living as a captive of the Comanche tribe, he rides deep into the tribe's territory to exchange goods for her freedom. As Cody escorts the captive woman away, he learns that she is Nancy Lowe (Nancy Gates), and that there is a sizable reward offered by her husband for her return. Cody and Mrs. Lowe must brave ruthless bounty hunters greedy for the reward, as well as the now-warring Comanches, to make it to safety.

programme.title: Live: Insight with Haslinda Amin

programme.title: Geronimo: An American Legend
programme.desc: Following the expansion of the United States into the Southwest, the Apache Indians are forced onto a reservation to live out their lives as lowly corn farmers. While many resign themselves to this fate, several Apache, including Geronimo (Wes Studi), refuse to go quietly. Hoping to quell a major rebellion, General Charles Crook (Gene Hackman) dispatches over 5,000 U.S. Cavalry soldiers, led by Lieutenant Charles Gatewood (Jason Patric), to hunt down Geronimo and his men.

programme.title: Drum Beat
programme.desc: In 1872, Modoc Indians ambush a stagecoach headed north to Oregon. The passengers include Johnny MacKay (Alan Ladd), who has been assigned by President Ulysses S. Grant to negotiate the surrender of Modoc warrior Captain Jack (Charles Bronson). There is also Nancy Meek (Audrey Dalton), an army colonel's daughter whom MacKay is escorting. Unfortunately, a vengeful act incites the Modoc, leaving MacKay, Meek and others caught up in the hostilities between the Indians and the army.

programme.title: The Great Northfield Minnesota Raid
programme.desc: In 1877, Frank (John Pearce) and Jesse James (Robert Duvall) are expecting to receive amnesty from the state of Missouri for all their previous crimes. But the railroad owners whom the brothers have repeatedly robbed intervene, stopping the amnesty and sending the Pinkertons to kill the gang. Meanwhile, Frank and Jesse team up with Cole Younger (Cliff Robertson) and his gang, and plot to rob the biggest bank west of the Mississippi, located in Northfield, Minn.

programme.title: Think Big
programme.desc: Children are the future -- and so are their inventions, which is why "Think Big" could be an important show. It features young inventors competing to see who can come up with the most-innovative invention. Each episode features two teams in the Think Tank -- a studio filled with art supplies and construction materials -- who brainstorm and choose materials before sketching, designing and building a prototype to be presented to a judge, who determines a winner. The champions earn bragging rights and the coveted Genius Cup.

programme.title: Biz Kids
programme.desc: "Biz Kids" is an educational television show that teaches financial education and entrepreneurship to a preteen audience. It uses sketch comedy and young actors to explain basic economic concepts.

programme.title: Sports Stars of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Profiles of the top rookie, college and high-school talent in sports; current athletes share their experiences, advice and personal impressions of the road to stardom.

programme.title: America's Heartland
programme.desc: Much of the food Americans eat is produced by farmers and ranchers in the country's heartland, but many people don't know how it's produced. "America's Heartland" provides information about the people and processes responsible for the availability of food and fuel across the country and around the world. The show's reporters and producers tell stories in topics that include farm families, consumer issues, animal welfare and crop sustainability. Some episodes also take the show abroad to countries such as Egypt and Taiwan to show the impact American agriculture has on the global economy.

programme.title: The Warrant
programme.desc: Sheriff John Breaker and his son, Cal, reunite after the Civil War to track down a fellow veteran, now a notorious gang leader. Their mission turns dangerous when they find themselves caught between their former friend's outlaw gang and the vigilantes who are taking the law into their own hands. Starring Neal McDonough (Yellowstone, Captain America), Casper Van Dien (Starship Troopers, Tarzan), Steven R. McQueen (The Vampire Diaries, Chicago Fire), and Annabeth Gish (X-Files, The Haunting of Hill House).

programme.title: The Warrant: Breaker's Law
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal John Breaker and his deputy ride to a town held hostage by a ruthless gang as they transport a prisoner through the West. With the fate of a community at stake, they must decide if they will abandon the town or make a stand for justice.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E3 Home of the Brave After an Indian attack on settlers, Buck finds himself in the middle, torn between his loyalty to his Kiowa brother and his bond with Pony Express members. After the tribe captures Ike, Buck must prove that he is a real Indian at heart.

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E37 The Raid A renegade Apache named Chaqua raids the McCain Ranch and kidnaps Mark. Lucas gathers a group of men to get Mark back, but Chaqua plans to make him an Apache warrior since he lost his own son. Lucas will stop at nothing to get his son back to safety.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E1 Outlaw's Inheritance The townspeople of North Fork begin to get suspicious when Lucas is named as the beneficiary in the will of an infamous outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E38 Boomerang Sam Elder unexpectedly dies after the bank forecloses on his ranch Lucas takes in his son, who is now orphaned. Lucas teaches the boy how to use a gun, but Lucas doesn't know the boy plans to get revenge on the banker.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E39 The Mind Reader Rancher John Hallager is shot and killed in North Fork and young Billy Mathis is a prime suspect. Billy was seeing Hallager's daughter but was told to stay away. Lucas believes in Billy's innocence, and a clue may help.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: It's a special Christmas Episode of The Cowboy Way. The holidays are always hectic, but for cowboys it's especially busy because it's also calving season. Time for the birth of new baby calves to join the herd. Bubba, Cody, and Booger must monitor their heifers around the clock and still find time to shop for gifts, decorate for Christmas, and enjoy time with their families. Booger helps Matthew pick out an extra-special gift to top Grandma's Christmas tree. Cody looks to buy Carter the perfect cute new puppy. Kaley enlists the wives to help prepare for the Thompson's annual holiday party. But, when a heifer who's in labor goes missing one night, the cowboys frantically search for her while trying to keep from missing the big event.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E1 Go Big or Go Broker Tough jobs and shady business deals force the cowboys to work smarter, not harder. A local rancher asks the guys to remove an ornery bull from his property, but this one is as bullheaded as they come - and takes longer than expected. Tired of scrapping for day wages, the cowboys decide to put their hard-earned experience to use: instead of working cattle for others, they'll start brokering herds themselves. After sifting through his grandmother's old photos, Booger reconnects with his past, then looks to the future by passing on the cowboy way to four-year-old Matthew. While Bubba confides in Kaley that the cowboys are reevaluating their business, Cody gets bad news about his upcoming rodeo, which is even worse news for his bank account.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E23 The Second Witness Lucas' life is in danger after he agrees to testify in a murder case in another town. The only other witness was killed, and when a gun-toting stranger appears at the McCain Ranch, Lucas now finds himself in grave danger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E24 The Trade Outlaw Sam Morley, an old friend, comes to the McCain Ranch. He asks Lucas to turn in him for the $500 reward and use the money to pay for his girlfriend's medical care. However, a bounty hunter has other ideas.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E6 Fool's Gold After discovering a river filled with gold, Jim Bridger and his fellow trappers believe they are near El Dorado, the mythical Spanish city of gold. But their insatiable greed turns friends into enemies and puts Bridger at risk of a gruesome fate.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E5 A Prince on the Prairie While guiding a hunting expedition, Jim Bridger must deal with an arrogant foreign prince who is abusing his servant boy. But the tables soon turn, when it's the prince who needs rescuing, and his only hope is the long-suffering servant boy.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E3 Pinkerton Detectives Track a Killer After a bank robbery, two Pinkerton detectives join forces to track the notorious Missouri Kid. During a shootout, the Missouri Kid kills seasoned detective Charles Schumacher, leaving young George Dougherty to finish the job and avenge his death.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E8 The Many Faces of Charles Siringo Unable to apprehend the train-robbing Smith Brothers, Sheriff Doc Shores calls the Pinkerton Detective Agency for assistance. The agency sends Charles Siringo, an undercover specialist known for his unorthodox methods of capturing criminals.

programme.title: Concrete Cowboys
programme.desc: When two lively cowboys from Montana are set up by a crooked sheriff, they wind up on the run. After arriving in Nashville, the two open a detective agency together and are soon hired to prevent the kidnapping of a country singer.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E4 Speak No Evil Ike witnesses a stagecoach massacre and turns the killer's leader over to the marshal. However, the gang kidnaps and threatens to kill one of the riders if Ike testifies. It is a race against time to serve justice and keep one of their own alive.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E16 The Brand While looking for his missing friend, Cheyenne tries to help a troubled young man responsible for caring for his younger siblings. He soon finds out that the man has committed a serious crime that is unfortunately associated with his missing friend.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E17 Decision at Gunsight In repayment for a debt owed him, Cheyenne receives the deed worth $3000 to a livery stable in Gunsight. However, Cheyenne discovers the truth when he learns of weekly payment to the Gerrard Gang is part of the deal.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Patsy Sully Hobbs and his outlaw gang ride to North Fork intent on taking over the town. They must first get rid of Lucas McCain without involving themselves. To do so, the gang forces the barber to fight Lucas, but Lucas suspects something is amiss.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E2 Bloodlines The North Fork Saloon is ransacked by the Malakie brothers, who are three rough mountain men. A fight breaks out and one brother is killed. Lucas is blamed and when their father arrives, he vows vengeance.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E3 The Blowout Al Walker, a sick gunslinger, comes to North Fork hoping to die in peace. Knowing that his presence will attract outlaws, Micah and Lucas put him in protective custody. When outlaws set fire to the town, Walker dies a hero by standing up to them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E4 Obituary Newspaperman Byron Claremont writes an article about old gunslinger, Ben Russell, who settled down years ago. The article brings in a young gun, who murders Russell. Next, Claremont writes about Lucas McCain and his rifle, which brings more tragedy.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: It's a special Christmas Episode of The Cowboy Way. The holidays are always hectic, but for cowboys it's especially busy because it's also calving season. Time for the birth of new baby calves to join the herd. Bubba, Cody, and Booger must monitor their heifers around the clock and still find time to shop for gifts, decorate for Christmas, and enjoy time with their families. Booger helps Matthew pick out an extra-special gift to top Grandma's Christmas tree. Cody looks to buy Carter the perfect cute new puppy. Kaley enlists the wives to help prepare for the Thompson's annual holiday party. But, when a heifer who's in labor goes missing one night, the cowboys frantically search for her while trying to keep from missing the big event.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E1 Go Big or Go Broker Tough jobs and shady business deals force the cowboys to work smarter, not harder. A local rancher asks the guys to remove an ornery bull from his property, but this one is as bullheaded as they come - and takes longer than expected. Tired of scrapping for day wages, the cowboys decide to put their hard-earned experience to use: instead of working cattle for others, they'll start brokering herds themselves. After sifting through his grandmother's old photos, Booger reconnects with his past, then looks to the future by passing on the cowboy way to four-year-old Matthew. While Bubba confides in Kaley that the cowboys are reevaluating their business, Cody gets bad news about his upcoming rodeo, which is even worse news for his bank account.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E23 The Second Witness Lucas' life is in danger after he agrees to testify in a murder case in another town. The only other witness was killed, and when a gun-toting stranger appears at the McCain Ranch, Lucas now finds himself in grave danger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E24 The Trade Outlaw Sam Morley, an old friend, comes to the McCain Ranch. He asks Lucas to turn in him for the $500 reward and use the money to pay for his girlfriend's medical care. However, a bounty hunter has other ideas.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E6 Fool's Gold After discovering a river filled with gold, Jim Bridger and his fellow trappers believe they are near El Dorado, the mythical Spanish city of gold. But their insatiable greed turns friends into enemies and puts Bridger at risk of a gruesome fate.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E5 A Prince on the Prairie While guiding a hunting expedition, Jim Bridger must deal with an arrogant foreign prince who is abusing his servant boy. But the tables soon turn, when it's the prince who needs rescuing, and his only hope is the long-suffering servant boy.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E3 Pinkerton Detectives Track a Killer After a bank robbery, two Pinkerton detectives join forces to track the notorious Missouri Kid. During a shootout, the Missouri Kid kills seasoned detective Charles Schumacher, leaving young George Dougherty to finish the job and avenge his death.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E8 The Many Faces of Charles Siringo Unable to apprehend the train-robbing Smith Brothers, Sheriff Doc Shores calls the Pinkerton Detective Agency for assistance. The agency sends Charles Siringo, an undercover specialist known for his unorthodox methods of capturing criminals.

programme.title: Concrete Cowboys
programme.desc: When two lively cowboys from Montana are set up by a crooked sheriff, they wind up on the run. After arriving in Nashville, the two open a detective agency together and are soon hired to prevent the kidnapping of a country singer.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E4 Speak No Evil Ike witnesses a stagecoach massacre and turns the killer's leader over to the marshal. However, the gang kidnaps and threatens to kill one of the riders if Ike testifies. It is a race against time to serve justice and keep one of their own alive.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E16 The Brand While looking for his missing friend, Cheyenne tries to help a troubled young man responsible for caring for his younger siblings. He soon finds out that the man has committed a serious crime that is unfortunately associated with his missing friend.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E17 Decision at Gunsight In repayment for a debt owed him, Cheyenne receives the deed worth $3000 to a livery stable in Gunsight. However, Cheyenne discovers the truth when he learns of weekly payment to the Gerrard Gang is part of the deal.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Patsy Sully Hobbs and his outlaw gang ride to North Fork intent on taking over the town. They must first get rid of Lucas McCain without involving themselves. To do so, the gang forces the barber to fight Lucas, but Lucas suspects something is amiss.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E2 Bloodlines The North Fork Saloon is ransacked by the Malakie brothers, who are three rough mountain men. A fight breaks out and one brother is killed. Lucas is blamed and when their father arrives, he vows vengeance.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E3 The Blowout Al Walker, a sick gunslinger, comes to North Fork hoping to die in peace. Knowing that his presence will attract outlaws, Micah and Lucas put him in protective custody. When outlaws set fire to the town, Walker dies a hero by standing up to them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E4 Obituary Newspaperman Byron Claremont writes an article about old gunslinger, Ben Russell, who settled down years ago. The article brings in a young gun, who murders Russell. Next, Claremont writes about Lucas McCain and his rifle, which brings more tragedy.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E2 Don't Mess with Texas The cowboys head to Texas! A simple wrangling job leads to the perfect cattle trading opportunity. The guys plot a course for Texas to capitalize on a buyer's market. Cody forgets his saddle on a routine roundup, and the only thing sorer than his backside is his ego when Booger and Bubba don't let him live down his mistake. After months of searching, Jaclyn and Booger finally find a piece of land perfect for settling down. But can they pull the trigger on the property before someone else swoops in? Bubba gets in hot water with Kaley when he tells Andrew, a long-term friend and ranch hand, that he can crash at their place - but without asking her first. Still licking his wounds from a double-cross, Cody weighs the pros and cons of holding his own rodeo. As their wives juggle life back home, the cowboys hit the road to broker their first big deal. They hope to find the crossbred cattle their buyer is looking for in the Lone Star State.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: The cowboys are deep in the heart of Texas! In this episode of The Cowboy Way, the guys try to cash in on a cattle bounty roundup: hard cash for each cow they catch. But this money ain't easy thanks to a sprawling 500-acre ranch covered in mesquite brush with razor-sharp thorns. Just when the cowboys think they've found a promising Texas cattle connection, Booger makes a big mistake that could jeopardize their first meeting with a hard-nosed rancher. Back in Alabama, Bubba and Kaley's house guest is beginning to overstay his welcome. As they try to teach Andrew the Thompson house rules, he commits the biggest cowboy sin of all - messing with Bubba's grill! Booger, Jaclyn, and Matthew care for a new-born calf. Misty has a special surprise for Cody. An offer to travel back to Texas for another cattle drive doesn't thrill the cowboys, but they begin to consider the networking potential and how it might make their cattle-trading dreams come true.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E25 One Went to Denver Tom Birch, an old childhood friend, comes to visit Lucas unexpectedly. Birch promises he is just passing through on his way to Denver. But Lucas soon finds out about a plot to rob the North Fork Bank and must choose between friendship and justice.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E26 The Deadly Wait Just released from prison, Dan Maury comes to North Fork in search of Marshal Micah Torrance, who helped get him locked up. Torrance carries a shotgun everywhere he goes, but Maury plans to wait him out.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E7 Molly's Choice A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Snakeroot Cure When a young girl is bitten by a rattlesnake, mountain man Jim Bridger finds himself in a race against time to save her arm and keep her alive as he desperately searches the wilderness for a medicinal plant that once saved the life of his friend.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E3 Bass Reeves Tracks Belle Starr As U.S. Marshal Bass Reeves attempts to arrest Belle Starr and her outlaw husband, Belle asks for 24 hours to find someone to care for her young daughter, Pearl. When the Starr family decides to flee instead, the Marshal must track them down.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E2 Billy the Kid: Birth of an Outlaw Teenaged fugitive William Bonney is given a second chance when a kindhearted ranch owner offers him a job. But when his new employer is killed in cold blood, Bonney reverts to his criminal ways, seeking vengeance and transforming into Billy the Kid.

programme.title: Gunslinger
programme.desc: When a town marshal is gunned down, his wife bravely returns fire at the gunmen and kills one. The widow is named the town's temporary marshal. At her husband's funeral, she spies the second killer and plans to finish avenging her husband.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E11 Long Gun from Tucson A killer, John Holliver, and his followers come to North Fork looking for revenge. All of the residents are terrified since they ran him out of town five years earlier. Lucas, now acting marshal, realizes that he must face Holliver and his men alone.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E5 Bad Blood Lou returns to her childhood orphanage to get her younger brother and sister. However, her gunrunning father gets to them first and hides them in his compound. When Lou confronts him, the other riders discover that Lou is actually a girl.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E18 The Spanish Grant Cheyenne rescues a baby from the wreckage of a stagecoach after an attack causes it to crash. He learns that the infant could be in danger when he discovers that the baby is now the heir to a large parcel of land after the murder of the landowner.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E19 Hard Bargain Cheyenne finds himself in the middle of a bank robbery. Once he's deputized, he goes on the hunt for the robber. After getting badly injured in a bear trap and rescued by the robber, he tries to help the man come clean.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E5 Tension Lucas and Mark help Sid Halpern with his cattle drive. When bounty hunter Clemmie Martin confronts Halpern and gunfire erupts, Halpern and Martin both perish. Lucas tries to hide Halpern's criminal past from his widow and son.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E6 Eddie's Daughter Eddie Halstead is a hotel clerk in North Fork. His daughter, Lillian, who he hasn't seen since childhood, arrives in town. She is now a dance hall girl and Lucas discovers criminals are following her, focused on the stolen money in her possession.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E7 Panic Lucas and Mark find a young couple in a wagon who are suffering from a fever. Lucas takes them to his ranch where a doctor confirms it to be yellow fever. No-good Brett Conway spreads the word in North Fork and panic sets in.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E8 Ordeal Lucas and Mark travel through the desert to get a supply of salt when a rattlesnake spooks their horses, causing the wagon to overturn. A horse must be put down due to injury and Lucas is also badly hurt. Mark has no choice but to go for help alone.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E2 Don't Mess with Texas The cowboys head to Texas! A simple wrangling job leads to the perfect cattle trading opportunity. The guys plot a course for Texas to capitalize on a buyer's market. programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E5 Tension Lucas and Mark help Sid Halpern with his cattle drive. When bounty hunter Clemmie Martin confronts Halpern and gunfire erupts, Halpern and Martin both perish. Lucas tries to hide Halpern's criminal past from his widow and son.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E6 Eddie's Daughter Eddie Halstead is a hotel clerk in North Fork. His daughter, Lillian, who he hasn't seen since childhood, arrives in town. She is now a dance hall girl and Lucas discovers criminals are following her, focused on the stolen money in her possession.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E7 Panic Lucas and Mark find a young couple in a wagon who are suffering from a fever. Lucas takes them to his ranch where a doctor confirms it to be yellow fever. No-good Brett Conway spreads the word in North Fork and panic sets in.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E8 Ordeal Lucas and Mark travel through the desert to get a supply of salt when a rattlesnake spooks their horses, causing the wagon to overturn. A horse must be put down due to injury and Lucas is also badly hurt. Mark has no choice but to go for help alone.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E4 Cash Cows First, the cowboys need to track down one of Bubba's most troublesome heifers before she can bust through his fence again. After briefly tending to business and family in Alabama, the guys head back to the Lone Star State to try and expand their network of contacts. Bubba, Cody, and Booger help their new friend Cash with a big Texas cattle drive in the hopes of both leading the herd to greener pastures and finding the big cattle deal they came west for. On the range they forge deeper bonds with their Texas counterparts, swapping cowboy stories around the campfire. But things take a turn for the worse when the herd overheats, and the creek they're all counting on has run dry as a bone. Back home, Jaclyn and Matthew are learning to love life on the ranch. Houseguest Andrew's disgusting habits have Kaley seeing red. And just as Misty gets back in the barrel-racing saddle, she starts to butt heads with her high-strung mare.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S5 E5 The Fall of Booger Bubba, Booger and Cody take an important step toward becoming big-time cattle brokers! The guys are roping and doctoring yearlings on the Texas range. But when Booger's most reliable horse Studly trips, smashing both horse and rider to the ground, Booger must rush out to find a vet and tend to his injured horse. Just as the cowboys are about to leave Texas, a local rancher makes them an offer they can't refuse. Will the guys gamble on a cattle deal, taking on a herd before they have a buyer lined up? Back home in Alabama, Kaley's patience reaches a breaking point as houseguest Andrew tracks in mud and expects a free lunch. To top it off, he then asks if his whole family can crash there while he searches for a permanent residence. Misty finds some extra help with her troublesome barrel-racing horse. Booger and Matthew are on the hunt for the perfect one-year anniversary gift for Jaclyn. But Booger may have a special surprise up his sleeve.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E27 The Wrong Man A crooked marshal comes to North Fork looking for a wanted man. He finds a man fitting the futitive's description. He deliberately kills the wrong man to collect the bounty and then blackmails the real outlaw, who wants to keep his past hidden.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E28 The Challenge An escaped killer wants to prove he hasn't lost his nerve when he holds up North Fork's General Store and takes Marshal Micah Torrance hostage. He provokes the town to try to face him, but only Lucas is strong enough to rise up to his challenge.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E9 The Prizefighter When Jim Bridger's second-in-command begins enforcing camp discipline with brutal violence, one trapper pushes back, and a showdown seems inevitable. Can Bridger intervene before the situation turns from mutual hostility into cold-blooded murder?

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E10 A Shard of Glass Haunted by the memory of leaving a man to die, mountain man Jim Bridger is determined not to repeat the mistake. When his trapping party runs out of water while crossing a barren desert, Bridger struggles desperately to keep his companions alive.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Discoveries of George McJunkin After a devastating storm, ranch foreman George McJunkin finds ancient bison fossils and flint points unearthed in a riverbank, and he sets out to find someone in the scientific community who will acknowledge the importance of his discovery.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E7 Calamity Jane Saves the Day Throughout Deadwood, Calamity Jane is known as a hot-tempered drunk. But when a deadly smallpox outbreak spreads through town, Calamity Jane works tirelessly to save the lives of the infected citizens who once treated her with such contempt.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: In 1866, the Reno Brothers gang is ravaging Indiana. When a detective agency sends a man to infiltrate the gang by posing as an outlaw, he sets a trap to capture the gang during an early-morning train robbery.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E6 Ten-Cent Hero A dime novelist takes revenge on Jimmy by creating a story in his latest novel, penning him as Wild Bill Hickok, "the fastest gun in the West." Soon afterward, a hired gunman arrives in Sweetwater to take him down in a gunfight.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E20 The Broken Pledge When accusations arise that Chief Sitting Bull's son killed a miner, Cheyenne meets with him in an attempt to keep the peace. However, when journalist Fay Kirby pushes her way onto the reservation for an interview, she creates an Indian uprising.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E1 Incident at Indian Springs A schoolmaster claims that he killed a bank robber. The townspeople soon celebrate his hero status. However, Cheyenne steps in when the dead criminal's brothers come to town for revenge against the schoolmaster and the school.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E9 The Spiked Rifle Lucas agrees to ride shotgun on a stagecoach carrying $20,000 in gold for North Fork banker John Hamilton after a man fails to show up. When three men rob the stage and take Mark hostage, Lucas must get both the gold and Mark back safely.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E10 Letter of the Law Marshal Micah Torrance arrests infamous outlaw Brett Stocker and deputizes Lucas McCain into duty so he can transport the outlaw to another town. When Stocker's gang ambush Torrance and send a letter to Lucas with demands, Lucas must act quickly.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E11 The Legacy Lucas agrees to do a good deed for Pop, the town drunk who is dying, by going along with a story that his ranch is owned by Pop. When Pop's son, Philip, arrives from back east the story backfires and now his son wants restitution.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E12 The Baby Sitter A dance hall singer asks for Lucas' help in hiding her 6-month-old baby girl from her estranged, self-righteous husband after he comes to town demanding she give the baby to him. Lucas must deal with the consequences of safeguarding the infant.

programme.desc: S2 E11 The Legacy Lucas agrees to do a good deed for Pop, the town drunk who is dying, by going along with a story that his ranch is owned by Pop. When Pop's son, Philip, arrives from back east the story backfires and now his son wants restitution.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E12 The Baby Sitter A dance hall singer asks for Lucas' help in hiding her 6-month-old baby girl from her estranged, self-righteous husband after he comes to town demanding she give the baby to him. Lucas must deal with the consequences of safeguarding the infant.

programme.title: Love in Wolf Creek
programme.desc: On the eve of a big-city donor's visit, Samantha Groves, director of the wildlife center, teams up with local rancher Austin Spencer and risks the future of her fledging rescue center to find and save a white wolf with life-threatening injuries.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E29 The Hawk Mark finally captures a hawk that he has been chasing but he encounters a rattlesnake in the process. When a stranger quickly comes to his rescue, a grateful Mark invites the man to the ranch, unaware he is a fugitive on the run from the law.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E30 Three-Legged Terror A troubled 18-year-old named Johnny Clover ransacks the North Fork Schoolhouse, stealing art supplies. Lucas later tries to help Johnny, but he lives with a controlling uncle who proves to be difficult to deal with.

programme.title: Legends of the Stagecoach
programme.desc: A marvel of engineering, the iconic stagecoach becomes indispensable when Americans settle the West. As stagecoaches and their heroic drivers navigate perilous trails to transport passengers and valuables, they are easy targets for lawless bandits.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E13 The Four Dead in Five Seconds Gunfight After two Mexican vaqueros cross the border in search of their stolen cattle, they are gunned down by the rustlers. When El Paso's newly appointed marshal arrests local ranch hands for the murders, he sparks one of the West's most infamous gunfights.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E5 The Gold Rush Detectives When gold goes missing from a safe in a remote mining town, Wells Fargo sends detectives Henry Johnson and Isaiah Lees to hunt down the culprits. Though the two men couldn't be more different, they must learn to work together to crack the case.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman
programme.desc: When a gunslinger with a bad disposition is nursed back to health and desired by a Quaker girl, he finds himself having to choose between his lawless life or the peaceful world of his newfound love.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E7 Molly's Choice A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Snakeroot Cure When a young girl is bitten by a rattlesnake, mountain man Jim Bridger finds himself in a race against time to save her arm and keep her alive as he desperately searches the wilderness for a medicinal plant that once saved the life of his friend.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: When a dispute over grazing rights to a fertile canyon leads to cattle rustling, the rustling ignites a range war, turning two brothers against one another. Will both brothers survive the deadly conflict between them?

programme.title: Once Upon a Texas Train
programme.desc: An outlaw and a Texas Ranger have a life-long personal feud, but now, as grumpy older men, they must put their differences aside and face a common problem - a young gang of outlaws ravaging Texas.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Marshal Micah Torrance, formerly a famous marshal, who is now a drunk crippled from a gunfight, stumbles into North Fork. Lucas McCain hires him in hopes of rehabilitating the man. The good deed quickly backfires when outlaws arrive.

programme.title: Love in Wolf Creek
programme.desc: On the eve of a big-city donor's visit, Samantha Groves, director of the wildlife center, teams up with local rancher Austin Spencer and risks the future of her fledging rescue center to find and save a white wolf with life-threatening injuries.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E29 The Hawk Mark finally captures a hawk that he has been chasing but he encounters a rattlesnake in the process. When a stranger quickly comes to his rescue, a grateful Mark invites the man to the ranch, unaware he is a fugitive on the run from the law.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E30 Three-Legged Terror A troubled 18-year-old named Johnny Clover ransacks the North Fork Schoolhouse, stealing art supplies. Lucas later tries to help Johnny, but he lives with a controlling uncle who proves to be difficult to deal with.

programme.title: Legends of the Stagecoach
programme.desc: A marvel of engineering, the iconic stagecoach becomes indispensable when Americans settle the West. As stagecoaches and their heroic drivers navigate perilous trails to transport passengers and valuables, they are easy targets for lawless bandits.

programme.desc: When a gunslinger with a bad disposition is nursed back to health and desired by a Quaker girl, he finds himself having to choose between his lawless life or the peaceful world of his newfound love.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Snakeroot Cure When a young girl is bitten by a rattlesnake, mountain man Jim Bridger finds himself in a race against time to save her arm and keep her alive as he desperately searches the wilderness for a medicinal plant that once saved the life of his friend.

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: When a dispute over grazing rights to a fertile canyon leads to cattle rustling, the rustling ignites a range war, turning two brothers against one another. Will both brothers survive the deadly conflict between them?

programme.title: Once Upon a Texas Train
programme.desc: An outlaw and a Texas Ranger have a life-long personal feud, but now, as grumpy older men, they must put their differences aside and face a common problem - a young gang of outlaws ravaging Texas.

programme.title: The Last Days of Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: When the famous James brothers give up robbing banks and attempt to live as reputable gentleman farmers, they are soon forced to seek revenge on the men who bomb their mother's house, crippling her, and killing their stepbrother.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E17 The Retired Gun Wes Carney, a famous gunfighter, and his new wife Clair move to North Fork. They open a store and settle down. However, three outlaws come to town to challenge him. Carney refuses and they ransack his store, forcing him to put his gunbelt back on.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E18 The Photographer Abel Goss is doing a portrait of Mark standing on a North Fork street. Suddenly he sees Colonel Whiteside and his sidekick, Jamison. When he recognizes them as the cruel men who tortured him in a Civil War prison camp, problems soon arise.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E19 Shivaree A young couple traveling to Yuma to get married come across Aaron Pelser's wagon train. Pelser and his group take things too far by forcing them to marry in North Fork, which is not the friendly spirit for a shivaree. Lucas steps in to help.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E20 The Deadeye Kid After witnessing a murder, 16 year-old Donnel O'Mahoney panics and comes to the McCain Ranch. A posse is on the hunt for the young man, believing he commited the crime. Mark befriends and hides O'Mahoney, who is traveling west from New York.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S1 E3 Jim Beckwourth: War Chief of the Crow When former slave Jim Beckwourth heads west to seek work as a trapper, he begins what will become one of the most eventful, heroic lives of all the mountain men. As a joke, one of Beckwourth's fellow trappers tells a group of Crow warriors that Beckwourth is a long-lost member of their tribe, and the adventure begins. Adopted by the Crow, Beckwourth joins them in a series of ferocious battles with other tribes, becomes a war chief, and falls in love with a fierce female warrior named Pine Leaf. He then uses his hard-won influence with the Crow to convince them to provide furs to the powerful American Fur Company. But an unexpected visit from legendary trapper and old friend Tom Fitzpatrick sets off a violent collision that forces Beckwourth to choose between the two worlds he loves.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E5 The Masterson Brothers Part 1 After Marshal Ed Masterson is shot while breaking up a barroom brawl, he hastily bans all firearms in Dodge City. Ed's swift proclamation is met with disdain by most townsfolk, including his own brothers, and places an even larger target on his back.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E6 The Masterson Brothers Part 2 After Marshal Ed Masterson is gunned down in Dodge City, his youngest brother, James, decides to follow in his footsteps and become a lawman. But when James' life is threatened, middle brother Bat Masterson races back from Arizona to protect his kin.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S6 E9 The Brahma Bull Cheyenne stops to visit his friend Sam Varney. When Varney's son, Harper, tries to rescue his Brahma bull calf from a barn fire with no success, he's badly injured. Cheyenne decides to bring him another bull, but trouble ensues during his journey.

programme.title: Abandoned Dreams
programme.desc: The abandoned boat dilemma is one of the most frustrating and alarming issues facing British Columbia's coastal communities. Reaching the end of their life cycle, with limited disposal options and almost no way to track ownership, hundreds of old boats are being left to rot, and sink or drift onto beaches and shorelines around our province. The result is a province-wide problem that affect coastal navigation, tourism and the environment. Abandoned Dreams looks into the root causes of this derel.

programme.title: Kojak
programme.desc: Marker to a Dead Bookie: Detective drama. Theo tricks everyone into thinking that he is corrupt in the hope that a drug kingpin will make a deal with him and incriminate himself. S1 Ep11

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.

programme.title: 2025 Isle of Man
programme.desc: Five classes. Ten races. Thirty-seven miles around one small island. Drivers risk it all at every one of the 200 dangerous turns chasing glory at speeds topping 200MPH in one of the most prestigious and challenging road races in the world.

programme.title: LOKAR Car Show
programme.desc: The gathering of Ford Mustangs happens in Sevierville, Tenn.

programme.title: Dealer Life

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey demonstrates how to change a four-headlight classic Chevy truck into a two-headlight classic Chevy truck, just by changing some sheet metal. Is it as easy as it looks, or are there some hidden challenges waiting to bite you?

programme.desc: Sam tackles the suspension in the '79 Pontiac Firebird Trans Am.

programme.title: Prodigy Racing League
programme.desc: Drafted by Williams, G2, Guild, BS+, SuckerPunch, and Thibaut Courtois, 30 of the world's best gamers, from 100K+ who entered season 1, battle in the Prodigy Racing League. Only 20 advance to the next PRL series. This is the future of motorsports.

programme.title: 2025 FIM Sidecarcross
programme.desc: The FIM Sidecarcross riders (a driver and a passenger) race on the same tracks as solo motocross but the handling of machines differs as sidecars don't lean. Skill meets speed, as they work together to navigate the courseand the fastest team wins.

programme.title: 2025 Ultimate Karting
programme.desc: The ultimate karting championship hosts drivers between the ages of 8 and 15 for the Junior classes, and 15+ for the senior classes. Competition is held within the following kart classifications: IAME cadets, HONDA cadets, Minimax, Junior Rotax, Senior Rotax, X30 Mini, X30.

programme.title: 2025 New Zealand Jet Sprints
programme.desc: With fast acceleration and even faster cornering, these boats produce some of the wildest action in motorsports as they race against time on a course with as many as 30 turns in less than a minute.

programme.title: 2025 GAA Classic Car Auction
programme.desc: Utilizing the six-acre Automotive Palace in Greensboro, N.C., the auction attracts enthusiasts who are looking for their favorite classic, muscle and collector car.

programme.title: 2025 GAA Classic Car Auction
programme.desc: Utilizing the six-acre Automotive Palace in Greensboro, N.C., the auction attracts enthusiasts who are looking for their favorite classic, muscle and collector car.

programme.title: 2025 Ultimate Karting
programme.desc: The ultimate karting championship hosts drivers between the ages of 8 and 15 for the Junior classes, and 15+ for the senior classes. Competition is held within the following kart classifications: IAME cadets, HONDA cadets, Minimax, Junior Rotax, Senior Rotax, X30 Mini, X30.

programme.title: 2025 New Zealand Jet Sprints
programme.desc: With fast acceleration and even faster cornering, these boats produce some of the wildest action in motorsports as they race against time on a course with as many as 30 turns in less than a minute.

programme.title: Chase'n
programme.desc: Chase and his team play in two states in one day.

programme.title: Chase'n
programme.desc: Chase decides to surprise his buddy and musician, Austin Snell, with an overhaul to his truck, and then tackles the craziness of CMA Fest.

programme.title: Chase'n
programme.desc: Chase purchases an additional tour bus; he performs concerts alongside musicians he admires; he receives a very big surprise.

programme.title: Launch Control
programme.desc: Travis Pastrana and Brandon Semenuk are up against Barry McKenna on the flat-out gravel stages of the Rally in the 100 Acre Wood. Meanwhile, in the nation's capital, Scott Speed is smoking tires in front of a huge crowd at the Red Bull Showrun.

programme.title: 2025 FIM World Superbike Championship
programme.desc: The premier production-based motorcycle championship on the planet featuring the fastest 1000cc models piloted by international level riders competing in a 12-round championship across the globe.

programme.title: LOKAR Car Show
programme.desc: A special event held at the NHOU headquarters in Chichester, New Hampshire celebrates franchisees and dealers from across the U.S. and Canada.

programme.title: My Classic Car
programme.desc: Caring for classic automobiles.

programme.title: Stacey David's GearZ
programme.desc: Stacey digs into building a brand-new bed for the '59 Apache right beside the old one!

programme.title: Sam's Garage
programme.desc: Sam installs a Holley Sniper EFI & MSD on Vic's '66 Mustang.

programme.title: 2025 FIA European Truck Racing Highlights
programme.desc: The biggest, most imposing racing series in the world, this championship is a truly unique motor sport spectacle and the pinnacle of global truck racing with the most professional teams and drivers.

programme.title: 2025 FIA European Truck Racing Highlights
programme.desc: The biggest, most imposing racing series in the world, this championship is a truly unique motor sport spectacle and the pinnacle of global truck racing with the most professional teams and drivers.

programme.title: 2025 Australian National Drag Racing Championship
programme.desc: From nitro-burning top fuel dragsters and Pro Mod doorslammers to tomorrow's future stars in junior dragsters, the ANDRA series features the best drag racers in Australia.

programme.title: 2025 TA2 Australia
programme.desc: Trans-Am's most popular category makes its way to Australia as these 525-horsepower, space-frame muscle cars take over as the country's fastest growing motorsport.

programme.title: 2025 Australian Motocross Championship
programme.desc: The Australian Motocross series is sanctioned by Motorcycling Australia and runs through Fall and Winter featuring three classes; the premier class MX1 plus MX2, and MX3. The latter features junior riders. An MXW class for women is also part of the series.

programme.title: Launch Control
programme.desc: Travis Pastrana has a change of heart after taking time off, returning to the Oregon Trail Rally. Back in Vermont, the team starts building Project Midnight WRX in preparation for Scott Speed's debut at Goodwood Festival of Speed.

programme.title: Launch Control
programme.desc: Scott Speed debuts Subaru's Project Midnight WRX at the 2024 Goodwood Festival of Speed, while Travis Pastrana returns with the Family Huckster to put on a show.

programme.title: Prodigy Racing League
programme.desc: Drafted by Williams, G2, Guild, BS+, SuckerPunch, and Thibaut Courtois, 30 of the world's best gamers, from 100K+ who entered season 1, battle in the Prodigy Racing League. Only 20 advance to the next PRL series. This is the future of motorsports.

programme.title: 2025 FIA Formula Regional European Championship Highlights
Road to Glory
programme.desc: We go behind the scenes and get to know the drivers behind the helmet; from seasoned veterans to young upstarts, each racer has a different path but one goal -- to win the title.

programme.title: 2025 Ferrari Challenge North America
programme.desc: The Ferrari Challenge North America is the ultimate test of driver ability with each competitor racing identically-prepared Ferraris while competing at some of the best circuits in North America.

programme.title: 2025 Monster Jam Primetime
programme.desc: Ryan Anderson leads Son Uva Digger into a head-to-head matchup against Wildside's Zack Garner.

programme.title: Magnum, P.I.
programme.desc: Echoes of the Mind - Part One: The first part of a two-part episode of the classic US action drama series. Thomas becomes involved in a bizarre situation involving a pair of twins. S4 Ep22

programme.title: Robin of Sherwood
